techmeme.title: Facebook and Instagram make AI labels less prominent on content edited with AI, moving them to a menu; the labels will still appear on AI-generated content (The Verge)
Sources: Spotify is trying to entice video-oriented creators to distribute shows on the platform in addition to YouTube, sometimes offering them seven figures (Ashley Carman/Bloomberg)
o1 System Card: "medium" rating for chemical, biological, radiological, nuclear weapon risk, and it "sometimes instrumentally faked alignment during testing" (Shakeel Hashim/Transformer)
OpenAI claims that in a qualifying exam for the International Mathematics Olympiad, o1 correctly solved 83% of the problems, while GPT-4o solved only 13% (Kyle Wiggers/TechCrunch)
OpenAI releases o1, the first of the rumored reasoning-focused Strawberry models, in preview, alongside a smaller o1-mini, for ChatGPT Plus and Team users (Kylie Robison/The Verge)
